item.title: macOS 26 Tahoe: The Ars Technica Review
item.description: Liquid Glass brings translucent sheen to the typical batch of iterative changes.

item.title: New “AppleCare One” plan bundles three extended warranties for $20 a month
item.description: You can add older devices to a new plan, even if they’re not already covered.
